name: scaling_parameter
description: controls the rate of decline of transmissivity in the soil profile

name: saturated_hydraulic_conductivity
description: saturated hydraulic conductivity of the C horizon of the soil

name: macropore_fraction
description: fraction of precipitation that can bypass the unsaturated subsurface zone and move directly into the saturated subsurface zone

name: soil_depth_total
description: total soil depth - could be 90 cm for tile depth

name: soil_depth_ab_horizon
description: soil depth of AB horizon - 25% thickness

name: field_capacity_fraction
description: fraction of soil moisture or water content in the soil after excess water has drained away

name: impervious_area_fraction
description: fraction of impervious area of basin

name: snowmelt_temperature_cutoff
description: temperature cutoff for snowpack accumulation and snowmelt

name: snowmelt_rate_coeff
description: used to control rate of snow melt

name: snowmelt_rate_coeff_with_rain
description: used to control rate of snow melt when raining
